about_the_game:
Have you ever been so distracted by your phone that you walked into a pole?
If you haven't, this game is for you.
If you have, this game is definitely for you!

Watch Where You're Going - a game about not watching where you're going

Stay one step ahead of your inbox

You will constantly receive messages asking you questions. Stay on top of them before your inbox is full.

There's an app for everything

Answers to the questions are scattered across the various apps on the phone. Sometimes it's as simple as looking up the weather. And sometimes you have to work out exactly where to look, or cross-reference multiple apps, or play a minigame. And the timers are ticking.

Master different phones

Just when you think you have it all figured out, try playing on completely different phones with completely different gameplay. One phone might have better navigation, but slow animations. Another might be more compact, but harder to type on. Learn all the tricks and nuances to use each one most efficiently.

Play at your own pace

You won't just get thrown into the fire - climb through multiple difficulty levels as you master the game. Play practice minigames in between runs. Track your stats and high scores all the way through.

But most importantly, don't forget to Watch Where You're Going!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible, 1 GB VRAM (anything newer than 10 years really)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse (or controller)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible, 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Logitech™ RGB Keyboard and mouse

short_description: A multitasking game about texting and walking. Get bombarded with messages, search for answers through the apps on your phone, and send answers back, all while making sure you don't walk into a pole.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Serbian*
*languages with full audio support
